description: floor(sum of factors of n / number of factors of n), or floor(sigma_1(n)/sigma_0(n)).
links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
example: a(4)=2 since the 3 factors of 4 are 1, 2 and 4 and floor((1+2+4)/3)=floor(7/3)=2.
prog: (Haskell)a057022 n = a000203 n `div` a000005 n-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jan 06 2012(PARI) a(n) = sigma(n)\numdiv(n); \\ _Michel Marcus_, Nov 15 2014
author: _Henry Bottomley_, Jul 21 2000
